definition: to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
general congress/meeting of the whole committee

sentences.english: To summarize the effects of rehabilitation nursing for 112 stroke patients with dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 总结了112例脑卒中患者吞咽障碍的康复护理体会。

sentences.english: This experience is useful to appreciate the beauty of languages in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这是非常有用的经验体会到，在世界语言之美。

sentences.english: They cannot experience the joy and inspiration of life.
sentences.chinese: 他们体会不到生活的快乐和鼓舞。

sentences.english: I am sure every one has certain feeling about those invisible accumulations.
sentences.chinese: 至于无形沉潜的那部分，我想大家都有过体会。

sentences.english: Carefully taste, really is so back.
sentences.chinese: 仔细体会一下，还真是如这么囬事。

sentences.english: Objective To conclude the experience from trabeculectomy under topical anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结表面麻醉下小梁切除术的体会。

sentences.english: This article talks about some personal experience of the author.
sentences.chinese: 本文根据个人执行实践谈些体会。

sentences.english: Well-operated investment distinguishes one from others between retiring in his 40's or his 60's.
sentences.chinese: 巧妙投资，你在不惑之年或花甲退休就会体会到区别。

sentences.english: Through the application of the bamboo can awake a poetry beauty in interior design.
sentences.chinese: 通过竹材的应用体会出室内设计的诗意之美。

sentences.english: Sun Tzu’s military mind knew this well.
sentences.chinese: 孙子的军事思想对此体会尤深。

sentences.english: I think there is something to Lean UX.
sentences.chinese: 我体会到有些东西是符合精益UX的。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effect of deep venous insufficiency and its complications in lower limb.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结下肢深静脉瓣功能不全及并发症的治疗体会。

sentences.english: The author brief introduced the history of A Bing and her experience of playing the musical composition.
sentences.chinese: 在这里作者简介了阿炳的身世和演奏这首乐曲的体会。

sentences.english: It has also introduced the basic operating rules and nursing realization of the hematal therapy of light quantum.
sentences.chinese: 表文介绍了光量子血疗的基本操作规范及护理体会。

sentences.english: To study application of anastomat and stapler in surgical reconstruction of digestive tract.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结消化道吻合器在消化道重建术中的应用体会。

sentences.english: With current wine, meat will be tasted more delicious; furthermore, we can further appreciate the delicious meat.
sentences.chinese: 吃一口肉喝一口酒，会让你更能体会出肉的鲜美。

definition: to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
to feel as if it had happened to oneself/to sympathize/(polite expression of gratitude for a favor received by a friend etc) I take it as a personal favor
